enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Preparatory work relating to Protocol Article 6: This issue was taken up by the COP on Wednesday, 8 December.
The Russian Federation emphasized the need for Parties to exchange information on, and prepare, JI project proposals.
The EU said efforts to make JI operational should be intensified.
The COP adopted conclusions in plenary on Friday, 17 December.
